Posts.Content: Why  should your Mom feel humiliated? she didn't do anything wrong on the contray she is a warrior in the fight of her life  win or lose . What is shameful about getting cancer? , cancer is a equal oppurtunity disease it does not recognize any scio economic boundaries at all .  I think the reason alot of people turn away is cuz they know in the deepest part of them that this could just as easily have happened to them .  Just be honest and give your Mom a safe place to talk  about anything , tell her your afraid of saying or doing the wrong thing ,talk about it with her , good luck ,
Posts.Title: Gruesome Details. Sorry to ask but Please help!

Posts.Content: I so get  that ,, I   feel so  bad about the way   I look.  bald and old  and  mutalated.  I  know I  need to snap out  of it and cheer  up .  I   have  a good prognosis, I might  make it I should feel  gratitude and all I  feel right this minute is misery  and  anger
Posts.Title: need product info for my hair growth after chemo

Posts.Content: I haave two more big chemos and 4 herceptins  to go .   I have heard everybody saying how they are so gratefull for this place and the support but all I can say is OMG.   I have a masectomy coming up  and everything I have read just scares the hell out of me .  I don't mean its your fault I really hope you get thru this okay I just don't understand why everybody says this sharing helps them so much cuz it is scaring the the hell out me ,
Posts.Title: Pain, scars after mastectomy

Posts.Content: just a lumpectomy? did they offer you the option of having the whole breast removed? might be safer way to go , if you are going with the lumpectomy for cosmetic reasons trust me you won't care about that when it comes back , just saying it is a big decision you might want 2 or 3 opinions
Posts.Title: Just Getting Started on this Journey

Posts.Content: It is probably just stress , my gwad you are dealing with so much already .  and people around  you may be down playing how hard it is so they don't have to feel guilty for not contributing more , that is pretty common ,still you know in your heart you have to face this thing head on so just take a deep breath and do it ,  good luck , god bless
Posts.Title: Scared to get checked

Posts.Content: thanks I'll pray for you too and all of us always , jill
Posts.Title: Just told my mom is going to die of cancer...

Posts.Content: really , you had a tumor shrinkage that put you in a chronic as opposed to fatal state based  just on diet ?? really. wow.  I know sugar is bad it is just so hard to give up bread and chocolate which has been like a natural mood stablizer for me. '   I just had a masectomy and chemo and now I am going to start radiation and all the doctors are saying "looks good , think we got it all" and I am so scared that this is going to happen to me too.   Less sugar for sure , cancer does love sugar, thanks for your post , its amazing how you didn't give up and I wish  you the very best , jill
Posts.Title: Just told my mom is going to die of cancer...

Posts.Content: she  has a great prognosis this should be enough for both of you .  It is so hard  i know  ,  just focus on the fact that she is gonna make it , she is one of the lucky ones , I have a year of herceptin to get thru but everybody says I'm okay , I don't feel okay , I feel scared and so weary , I am starting radiation next friday , did your wife have that? anyway hang in there ,
Posts.Title: Need Help

Posts.Content: thank you
Posts.Title: Need Help

Posts.Content: A pet scan , which is basically a mri using dye contrast to locate tumors ,  seems cancer likes sugar so the give you a little sugar coktail wait for the sugar to metabolize and send you into the great big scarry tube with lovely music playing of course and then they look for sugar hot spots which would indicate tumor activity .   I had a time getting one here in the us , time in the tube is expensive.  It is possible to acess help, your mom needs a mri  with contrast , ie pet scan , so now that you know that try to figure out how to use the resources you can access to make that happen , people want to help , I have been amazed at how caring  people can be , stand up to cancer , fight fight fight ,
Posts.Title: How can we detect cancer metastasis ?

Posts.Content: I think this post should absloutely be followed by a big "these results are not typical ".    The   numbers coninue to show that chemo is your best chance if you tolerate well .   best of luck
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...

Posts.Content: I asked someone a question  about why they  made the choice not to have chemo after surgery and now I can't find  that question so if you are out there and you see this post could you get back to me I am really interested in why you  made the choice not to follow up with chemo  after your surgery .     I am in my last round of chemo before surgery , I was diagnosed   on April fool's day  with stage three ductual carcinoma ,  good news is it had not spread, lymph biopsy was inconclusive . I am tolerating chemo pretty well.   I am her2 positive so I am getting herceptin   every Friday  and the big chemo every 2 to 3 weeks .  I feel very nervous that I will never really be well again ,  I am looking for posts from people that have come thru and are five years out   but I don't see too many of those.  I guess I can understand why people would not want to  think about  that scary time in thier lifes,  posting here would just be a reminder.  For me  it sure would be nice to see more posts that say "hey  I made it and I am feeling great" ,  waving , good luck everybody ,
Posts.Title: how do I follow my posts

Posts.Content: I would just like to second this post , solid helpfull advice , thanks , artfull dodger ,
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...

Posts.Content: question, so the docs are declaring you cancer free and suggesting you only have chemo if at some later date your cancer comes back?      or did they encourage you to do it know to increase your chances of staying cancer free and if so what specifically were your reasons for not agreeing to that ?
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...

Posts.Content: Nobody can really tell you what to do , what is best for you .  I would do both , chemo and the hormone blocker in fact that is what I am doing.  As you are just a stage one  it is a different thing you are facing.  My little obe won konobe voice tells me  to throw everything I can  at this thing and just pray it stays gone,  I wish you luck on this journey. I only know one thing for sure  whatever you decide to do you will be forever changed by this experience ,  waving , jill
Posts.Title: Chemo are hormone blocker

Posts.Content: let me get this right are you are really threatening a seriously ill woman with eternal damnation. ??? This seems okay to you? That which animates and binds all living things does not require that we believe , revenge on the nonbelievers?. Revenge is a petty human emotion . Lead a good life , treat others the way you would want to be treated ,  that is more then enough ,
Posts.Title: Best friend has stage 4 cancer - getting worse. I'm lost.

Posts.Content: I will pray for you all , I am so sorry .
Posts.Title: Best friend has stage 4 cancer - getting worse. I'm lost.

Posts.Content: I will  be praying to what ever powers there may be  for us all and for rain in californa ."there are more things in heaven and earth then are dreamt of in our philosophy "
Posts.Title: Is she lying about Breast cancer?

Posts.Content: also good luck to you , waving from drought riddin california
Posts.Title: Is she lying about Breast cancer?

Posts.Content: This is so similar to my case it made me feel better, thanks
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Treatments

Posts.Content: good luck grandma ,   my surgery is going to be the first week in November ,  masectomy but only on one side no signs of cancer in the other breast .  we can do this right ,  be strong .
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I think dave  is a drug salesman and not a bad one . I think Dave should lose the bit about trying to demonize the md's .  Explaining how they don't profit from his product and how they would see us all dead dead dead before they would recommand we try something that does not show a fiscal profit for them.  I think he actually loses credibility by using this tatic.I believe in my heart that my oncologist wants me to live and she is not above recommending anything that she thinks will get us there,  there may be something to this product , so many people have tried to sell me so many things scince I was diagosed  in april .
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I don't know if you remember me but I talked to you here a couple of weeks ago  just after your surgery.  I wanted to tell you I made it tru  my masectomy  and am now just trying to get my bearings post surgery ,  happy holidays grandma ,  waving
Posts.Title: My Journey

Posts.Content: Hi, just FYI, they are not hormones , they are actually hormone blockers , they block the bodies estorgen production , tomaxifin is the one I am on .   I have an estrogen driven ductual carcinoma  also known as her2 positive breast cancer , this is a much easier type of breast cancer to treat then triple x, it be tougher to get a handle on . but there is tons of hope with breast cancer , many many success stories  out there.
Posts.Title: Is she lying about Breast cancer?

Posts.Content: you really have to be proactive about acessing treatment , don't allow them to dissmiss your concerns , speak up !!!! I hope your cancer responds well to chemo ,  I was diagnosised as a stage 3 because of the size of the original tumor, but then I had the pet scan , wear they give you the sugar drink , cancer cells like sugar , then they stick you in the big mri tube and play lovely music , james taylor or bach , your choice , and look  for hot spots , scary , I am  waiting to go back into the tube , its been about a year scince my  last pet scan , I have been through 6 rounds of chemo  and 5 weeks of radiation and the lateral masectomy .I am tired , I remember someone saying  in the beginning , this is a marathon not a sprint , I understand now what that means , accept the good , try not to lose  your ability to experience joy , hugs
Posts.Title: Is she lying about Breast cancer?

Posts.Content: get the biopsy now , don't wait till it spreads to your liver or your brain and they tell you they're sorry but now that it has spread your chances of surviving are not as good ,   do it now!!!!!!! if it is nothing you have lost nothing if it is something you have literally saved your life ,  I am surounded by women in the oncology ward who are in thier 30's
Posts.Title: Breast Lump

Posts.Content: Iam so sorry , that is got to be scary but you have a  good  chance,   can   I ask how they treated your  initial  diagnosis ,  did   you   have a  masectomy
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: so you are   trying to make money, I am not saying there is anything wrong with that ,I am not sure this is the right place for you though.  all drugs are drived from something that exists in nature, these statistics are really scary  , 80 percent of us regardless of our orginal diagnosis are going to die ,?  that can't be right , I hope that isn't right
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: the american cancer society
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: nobody can tell  you who to trust or what to believe ultimately it is not up to us , it is up to that which animates and binds all living things , that which was is and always will be , god,, jehova,, yawah ,allah , call it what you will , it is  not up to us , life comes thru us but it does not come from us  , it does not belong to us ,  just my opinion , I wish you good things ,
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I just want to say good luck , and you are not alone there are so many of us out there pulling for each other , good luck !
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I can't help thinking if you had had the masectomy when you were diagonsised you would not be facing this now.   I really can't understand why some people are so concerned about keeping thier breasts. Three out of 4 people who refuse treatment die, why would anyone choose that>   I respect your right to follow your instincts but I think your wrong not to listen to your doctors , I think your so wrong .  Why is it a either or situation anyway, can't you do both.   It is not about scaring you for the sake of scaring you , why would anybody want to do that , they don't profit from that. They are trying to keep you alive, wake up before it is to late .
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Great ,  you made it!  pink power!! awsome sauce.  I was thinking about you ,  my surgery is november 12 th so still waiting ,  waving at you ,
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Let me guess dave you are somehow in the buisness of promoting this live saving   drug ,  that mimics estrogen in the body  ?   for women like me who have her2 positve breast cancer and are on estrogen blockers take this drug?,  sounds scary   if the body thinks this is estrogen and my cancer is an estrogen driven cancer then  wouldn't this be dangerous for me>?

Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I just want to say good luck , and you are not alone there are so many of us out there pulling for each other , good luck !
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: hi ,    I got to 2 wigs from paula young that were not real hair wigs and they felt like dog fur to me  and that really bothered me.          I decided to pay the extra money for a real hair wig and I went to lacewigs.com and got a real hair wig for think 138.00 which is a good price .   It is  fine and I am fine with it.  I am in a chemically induced menopause and the hot flashes are so bad that I don't wear anything on my head unless I have to right now but I was happy with lacewigs I thought it was worth the extra money to get real hair  it lasts longer and feels so much better .  just my opinion good luck ,   its a marathon not a sprint ,
Posts.Title: wig-ged out!

Posts.Content: You got this!!! power thru do it for all the women who never get the chance to fight back ,   hugs!!!
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: hi ,    I asked about that , I wanted to get a double masectomy just to be safe .  I was told I had no more chance of  getting cancer in the other breast then I would have if I had never been diagnosised with breast cancer at all . this is all so hard .
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I have had my drain in for 40 days,  has anybody else had that happen, is that too long , should I be worried , they want to start radiation but they can't start till the drain comes out and I just keep leeking ,  feeling a little nuts about it ,   question , how long was your drain in??

Posts.Title: wig-ged out!

Posts.Content: 3WEEKS!!  I been    posting here for about   a   month asking what I thought were simple direct  questions and I have yet to get a  single response  ,  I would have answered you sooner if  I had seen   this ,  I would get  a  second opinion  ,    I  had my last big chemo  on august  29th  and my  oncologist said my surgery would be  no less then 3 weeks and no more then 5 weeks   from that date, so very   soon . good   luck,   I  think people care it is   just  alot   of posts here get   overlooked,
Posts.Title: mastectomy with liver mets

Posts.Content: well the idea if you  have a metastatic breast cancer is to treat with chemo to shrink the cancer as much as possible and then cut it out .  the liver is problematic , my cancer was at stage three , large but no meatastisis that they could see anyway . so  they are shrinking it to safe margins and then cutting it out .  the only advice I can think to give that might help is to say no matter how informed you are you are not a doctor of oncology.  At some point you are going to have to trust someone  only a fool has themselves as lawyer it is kind of he same thing , good luck , this is really tough stuff to have to deal with , I wish you well
Posts.Title: mastectomy with liver mets
